full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA DBANG GI DON GYI DE NYID RAB TU GSAL BA BZHUGS SO, ,
